content:
（三年级起点） 义务教育教科书义务教育教科书英語 （三年级起点） 英語 三年级 Action English 三年级上册上册 
（三年级起点） 主编： 桂诗春副主编： 邹启明黄志红义务教育教科书英 語三年级上册基础教育出版分社： 地址： 北京市西三环北路19号外研社大厦基础教育出版分社（100089） 咨询电话： 010 — 88819666（编辑部）/ 88819688（市场部） 传真： 010 — 88819422（编辑部）/ 88819423（市场部） 网址： http://www.nse.cn 电子信箱： beed@fltrp.com 或登录 http://www.nse.cn（留言反馈）栏目购书电话： 010 — 88819928 / 9929 / 9930（邮购部） 购书传真： 010 — 88819428（邮购部） 出版 人：蔡剑峰项目统筹：王芳 项目策划：申蔷 陈海燕项目负责：黄江岩责任编辑：邢印姝黄江岩封面设计：平原 英语 (三年级起点) 三年级上册学生用书主 编：桂诗春副主编：邹启明黄志红亲爱的小朋友们： 你们可曾想过周游世界与各国小朋友畅谈？你们可曾想过长大以后，用英语在广阔的世界舞台上展示自己的聪明才智，和不同肤色、不同种族的人一起共建美好的地球村？相信你们一定有这样的愿望。 《英语》（新交际）将帮助你们在轻松愉快的环境下学习英语，了解中外文化，享受学习英语的乐趣，感受运用英语进行交流的喜悦。 这套教材中有五个小朋友：Katy, Ben, Susan, Mike和Tommy，他们都是你们的同龄人，和你们一样有自己的个性，也有自己的理想。他们来自讲英语的国家，有着不同的生活背景。他们将伴随你们一起学习，共同成长。另外，还有一个来自不同星球的伙伴，他叫Danny。Danny的睿智和幽默将会给你们的英语学习带来无穷的乐趣。希望你们喜欢这些小朋友，好好学习英语！ 编者朋 小致 友

37 My Family Listen and repeat. No, it’s me! It’s an old photo. Is that you? No, it isn’t. It’s my sister. Who is the baby? Guess. Susan, can I look at your family photo? Is it your brother? Yes, here it is. Look, this is my father, and this is my mother. Let's Listen Lesson 7 
Unit 3 My Family 38 1. Practise the dialogues. 1. Listen , point and say. f a ce m e f ive 2. Listen and chant. Name, name, name, what ’ s your name? Me, me, me, say after me. Fine, ﬁne, ﬁne, I am ﬁne. 2. Talk about an old family photo. A: Look at this old photo. This is my... B: Is this...? · Is this your sister? ∶ No, it ’ s me. · This is my brother. ∴ He ’ s five. ∶ How old is he? Let's Talk Sound Time

Unit 3 My Family 40 Play a guessing game. Read and trace. · Who is this boy? ∴ Sam is right. He is Carl. · Who is this girl? ∴ No, it ’ s me. ∶ Is that Lily? ∶ Is that John? ∶ Is that Carl? ∶ Is that Henry? ∶ Is that Kate? ∶ Is that Jane? Let's Write Fun Time

You, you, you, how are you? no UFO A: Look at this photo of my family. B: Who is...? · Who ’ s the man in the photo? ∶ He ’ s my father. · Who ’ s the girl in the photo? ∶ That ’ s me. Let's Talk Sound Time Lesson 8

B: I have... father great hi · What do you have in your bag? ∶ I have some candy. · I have a pen and a pencil in my pencil box. ∶ Good! Let ’ s draw a picture. Let's Talk Sound Time Lesson 10

content:
My Classroom 63 Lesson Twelve Look and Draw Look at the picture on the wall, Open the window near the door. Put the paper on the floor, Draw your teacher Mr Gore. table window wall floor door Let's Chant Learn the Words Lesson 12 
Unit 4 My Classroom 64 Listen and repeat. That’s the door. Oh, it’s not a door. It’s Mr Gore! OK! That’s the window. Listen. Point to the window. Let’s play a pointing game. Point to the floor, and then point to the wall. This is the floor, and that is the wall. Point to the door. Let's Listen Good morning, Mr Gore.

content:
My Classroom 65 1. Practise the dialogues. 2. Point and say. 1. Listen , point and say. mother nine pen 2. Listen and chant. Morning, morning, good morning. Good night, good night, say good night. Please, please, sit down, please. A: Point to the... B: This is... That ’ s a desk. No. It ’ s a pencil. ∶ This is a pen. · Point to the pen. Point to the desk. Let's Talk Sound Time Lesson 12 
Unit 4 My Classroom 66 Read and act out the story. Uh-oh! Tommy, your desk is big. It’s not a desk. It’s a table. What a big chair you have! It’s not a chair. It’s a sofa. Tommy, your door is open. Well, it’s not a door. It’s a French window. Let's Read 
My Classroom 67 Read and trace. Play a bingo game. Bingo! A B C D Choose a picture... Now, listen to me and tick the words. Pencil box, TV, floor. Let's Write Fun Time Lesson 12

Unit 4 My Classroom 68 1. Listen and speak. Review Four (1) Listen and number the pictures. (2) Listen again and repeat. A: Do you have a pencil? B: Yes. This is my pencil. 1 
My Classroom 69 2. Read and write. I can see a d , a w , a m , a T , a computer, a blackboard, some chairs and desks in the picture. door window desk chair TV computer map blackboard ① What do you have in your pencil box? I have an , a and a in it. ② What do you have in your schoolbag? I have a and some in it. ③ What ’ s in your classroom? A , a , some and . My work is (1) Look and write. (2) Read and answer. content: 后记 同学们，学过这本教材之后，你们和书中的六个小伙伴，特别是来自外星球的Danny交上朋友了吗？你能像他们一样说出一些英语、用英语与人进行简单的交流了吗？你喜欢上这套教材、喜欢上学习英语了吗？我们真切地希望你们能够继续努力，在课堂上、在生活中大胆地使用英语，多用英语做事，让学英语和用英语成为自己生活的一部分。 这套教材从构思到创作完成都倾注着一批优秀的教学和教材编写专家的心血， 凝结着他们的智慧与汗水。除主编、执行主编及主要编者以外，我们还要特别感谢曾经为这套教材辛勤付出、无私奉献的一批优秀教师和其他编写人员，他们是： 鲁宗干、张杰、李季、匡丽亚、彭雪红、区碧茹、杨柳青和许桦淳。没有他们和编写组的共同努力，就没有这套教材。 我们期待同学们在不久的将来能用英语在广阔的世界舞台上展示自己的才能， 能和不同肤色、不同种族的人一起共建美好的地球村！ 本教材编写组 2013 年 6 月
